echelon.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a rank or level of authority in an organization, business etc, or the people at that level
echelon.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Their clients are drawn from the highest echelons of society.
echelon.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a line of ships, soldiers, planes etc arranged in a pattern that looks like a series of steps
echelon.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a rank or level of responsibility within an organization, group of businesses etc, or a person at that level
echelon.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: those in the highest echelons of management
The banking system normally helps allocate money to the lower echelon but at the moment there is a credit squeeze.
